Journey into relaxation with fragrances infused with essential oils.
Serenity + Calm (Lavender Thyme) Medium Scented Candle

Create a serene environment thanks to the calming and balancing benefits of lavender. Enhanced with essential oils of bergamot, rosemary, thyme and eucalyptus, this fragrance diffuses a fresh scent along with touches of orange blossom, allowing you to relax your body and quiet your mind.
Top Notes: Bergamot, Eucalyptus, Rosemary Middle Notes: Lavender, Thyme Bottom Notes: Clove, Cedar, Patchouli
Essential Oils: Rosemary, Eucalyptus, Camphor, Lavender, Lavandin, Cedarwood, Fir needle, Fir Balsam, Orange, Patchouli, Bergamot, Thyme
Soy wax blend candle, delivering a clean burn
Available in a variety of other fragrances
Since 1994, Chesapeake Bay Candle has been the home fragrance brand synonymous with stylish design and unique nature-inspired fragrances.

Chesapeake Bay Candle draws inspiration from Maryland's idyllic shoreline with core products containing fragrances inspired by local botanicals and fruits such as: Sea Grass, Magnolia, Bergamot, Rosemary, Sage and more.
The Chesapeake Bay Candle Mind & Body Collection is a fragrance filled journey into wellness for the mind & body.

column2: Clean burn and transparency with frosted finish
#653 in Home & Kitchen (See Top 100 in Home & Kitchen)

column1: Discover the calm and serenity of lavender and thyme in your room with Chesapeake Bay's medium-sized scented candle. Made in the USA, this unique piece combines a blend of natural soy wax and all-natural essential oils to create a well-balanced aroma that helps calm the mind and body. As it burns for about 50 hours, the soft-colored frosted jar enhances the glow of the burning flame, creating a serene aura. Whether it's for self-indulgence or gifting to your loved ones, this recyclable jar candle adds a touch of tranquility to every occasion.
